citation.article-title: Syntrophomonas wolfei subsp. methylbutyratica subsp. nov., and assignment of Syntrophomonas wolfei subsp. saponavida to Syntrophomonas saponavida sp. nov. comb. nov.

p.s: Description of Syntrophomonas saponavida sp. nov. comb. nov.
S. saponavida (sa.po.na′vi.da. L. n. sapo–onis, soap; L. adj. avidus. Greedy; N.L. fem. adj. saponavida, greedy for soap). Basonym: S. wolfei subsp. saponavida Lorowitz et al., 1989.
The description of S. saponavida sp. nov. comb. nov. is that given for S. wolfei subsp. saponavida by Lorowitz et al. [5].
The type strain is strain SD2T [=DSM 4212T (co-culture with Desulfovibrio sp. G11)].
